name: fixOS
description:
It seems like your Operating System broke. Let's try to fix it!

Use your mouse  to navigate through the windows and files of different kinds

Controls:
  • left mouse button on file - open the file
  • right mouse button on file - drag&drop the file
  • left mouse button on window’s titlebar - drag&drop the window
  • right mouse button on window’s titlebar - enter filename editing mode
  • Keyboard - type name when in filename editing mode
  • Keyboard - used in minigame
